templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://howitzerclothing.com/pages/loyalty-program?srsltid=AfmBOopttY7KHi6NlT4P9grFAM1ADJq9GYygAJ0NArkOI4IIpsHY5IOe

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://howitzerclothing.com/pages/size-guide

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Where are your jeans made?
templates.content: The material is from out of the country (Mexico and China), however, they're all assembled and design-stitched here in Southern California.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Many items ship the same or next business day, however due to huge influxes of orders we often receive, we may require 3-5 business days for processing. Once shipped via USPS, it will take 3-5 business days domestically, and 7-14 business days internationally.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://instagram.com/howitzerclothing and FB here:  https://www.facebook.com/howitzerclothing/

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at  customerservice@howitzerclothing.com

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our return policy here - https://howitzerclothing.com/pages/return-policy If you have any questions or need assistance with your return, please email us directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at sales@howitzerclothing.com Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We do offer free shipping on US orders over $99! Maybe you can add something else to reach the min?

templates.name: Is return shipping free?
templates.content: A $5 shipping fee will be deducted from your total refund for returns, but for exchanges & store credit, the $5 shipping fee will be waived. Exchanges are also acceptable for different products of equal or less value. As for defective items that are returned, the $5 shipping fee is waived if we verify the product was defective when we receive it.

templates.name: Military / First responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can get your discount here - https://howitzerclothing.com/pages/govx-id-discount

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Restock
templates.content: Please email our CS team at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com and you may be able to get an answer on if we plan to restock the item. Also, click on your size and fill in the “notify me when this product is available” form on the product page, and definitely keep an eye out :)

templates.name: Material of boxers?
templates.content: They are 92% polyester/ 8% spandex.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help! Our clothes generally run true to size and I recommend taking a look at our size guide on each product page. If you're still unsure, please email us directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com and our team will be happy to assist you!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-855-717-3963, Monday - Friday from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm PST.

templates.name: Where are you located?
templates.content: We're located at Seal Beach, CA.

templates.name: Can you retroactively apply my code?
templates.content: Please email us directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com with the order number and the code that you wish to apply. Our team will be more than happy to look into this for you!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://howitzerclothing.com/collections/sale
